languages.text: "Я не знаю настоящий он комиссар или нет, но лжец и садист он отменный. Схема у него была простая: находить людей на улицах Прорвы, давать им надежду на то, что отсюда можно выбраться и вербовать в свое "сопротивление". Пара прочувствованных речей, еда, кров, потрепанная винтовка в руках — и вот мы, как наивные глупцы, уже поверили в то, что можно бежать из Комморры".

traits.locale_text: "Я не знаю настоящий он комиссар или нет, но лжец и садист он отменный. Схема у него была простая: находить людей на улицах Прорвы, давать им надежду на то, что отсюда можно выбраться и вербовать в свое "сопротивление". Пара прочувствованных речей, еда, кров, потрепанная винтовка в руках — и вот мы, как наивные глупцы, уже поверили в то, что можно бежать из Комморры".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."
languages.original_text: "Я не знаю настоящий он комиссар или нет, но лжец и садист он отменный. Пара прочувствованных речей, еда, кров, потрепанная винтовка в руках — и вот мы, как наивные глупцы, уже поверили в то, что можно бежать из Комморры".

A few emotional speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us naive fools to believe we could escape from Commorragh."

His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「彼が本物のコミッサーかどうかは知りませんが、並外れた嘘つきでありサディストです。やり方は単純でした。亀裂の路上で人を見つけ、ここから抜け出す方法があるという希望を与え、そして彼らを自分の抵抗勢力に誘い込む。感情に訴えるスピーチ、食料、シェルター、ボロボロのラスガン…私たち騙されやすい単純な人間をコモラフから脱出できると信じさせるには、それだけで十分だったのです」
languages.original_text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: 「彼が本物のコミッサーかどうかは知りませんが、並外れた嘘つきでありサディストです。やり方は単純でした。亀裂の路上で人を見つけ、ここから抜け出す方法があるという希望を与え、そして彼らを自分の抵抗勢力に誘い込む。感情に訴えるスピーチ、食料、シェルター、ボロボロのラスガン…私たち騙されやすい単純な人間をコモラフから脱出できると信じさせるには、それだけで十分だったのです」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “我不知道他是不是真正的政委，但他在撒谎这方面确实很有一套。他的手段很简单，去裂隙的街上找到那些人，招募他们加入他的‘反抗军’。只要为我们提供食物和住处，来上几句振奋人心的演说，再发一把破破烂烂的激光枪，像我们这样的蠢货就真的会相信能逃出科摩罗。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道他是不是真正的政委，但他在撒谎这方面确实很有一套。他的手段很简单，去裂隙的街上找到那些人，招募他们加入他的‘反抗军’。只要为我们提供食物和住处，来上几句激动人心的演说，再发一把破破烂烂的激光枪，像我们这样的蠢货就真的会相信能逃出科摩罗。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «No sé si es un Comisario de verdad o no, pero sí sé que es un mentiroso y un sádico excepcional. Su método era sencillo: encontrar gente en las calles del Abismo, darles esperanzas de que había una forma de salir de este lugar y reclutarlos para su "resistencia". Unos cuantos discursos conmovedores, comida, cobijo, un rifle láser destartalado... era todo lo que hacía falta para que nosotros, simplones inocentes, creyéramos que podíamos escapar de Commorragh».
languages.original_text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: «No sé si es un Comisario de verdad, pero sí sé que es un mentiroso y un sádico excepcional. Su método era sencillo: encontrar gente en las calles del Abismo, darles esperanzas de que había una forma de salir de este lugar y reclutarlos para su "resistencia". Unos cuantos discursos emotivos, comida, cobijo, un rifle láser destartalado... era todo lo que hacía falta para que nosotros, simplones inocentes, creyéramos que podíamos escapar de Commorragh».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, ob er ein echter Kommissar ist, aber er ist ein grandioser Lügner und Sadist. Seine Methode war simpel: Leute auf den Straßen der Kluft finden, ihnen Hoffnung geben, dass man von hier entkommen kann, und sie dann für seinen 'Widerstand' rekrutieren. Einige ergreifende Reden, Essen, eine Unterkunft, ein ramponiertes Lasergewehr — mehr war nicht nötig, um uns naive Einfaltspinsel glauben zu lassen, dass wir aus Commorragh entkommen könnten."
languages.original_text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, ob er ein echter Kommissar ist, aber er ist ein hervorragender Lügner und Sadist. Seine Methode war simpel: Leute auf den Straßen der Kluft finden, ihnen Hoffnung geben, dass man von hier entkommen kann, und sie dann für seinen 'Widerstand' rekrutieren. Ein paar emotionale Reden, Essen, eine Unterkunft, ein ramponiertes Lasergewehr — mehr war nicht nötig, um uns naive Einfaltspinsel glauben zu lassen, dass wir aus Commorragh entkommen könnten."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas s'il est vraiment commissaire ou pas, mais en tout cas, c'est un as du mensonge et un vrai sadique. Sa méthode est plutôt simple : il trouve les gens qui errent dans l'Abîme, leur donne l'espoir qu'il y a un moyen de sortir de cet enfer et les invite à rejoindre sa soi-disant résistance. Quelques discours passionnés, de la nourriture, un abri, un vieux fusil laser... c'est tout ce qu'il a fallu pour nous convaincre qu'on pouvait s'évader de Commorragh. Qu'est-ce qu'on a pu être naïfs... »
languages.original_text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas s'il est vraiment commissaire ou pas, mais en tout cas, c'est un as du mensonge et un vrai sadique. Sa méthode est plutôt simple : il trouve les gens qui errent dans l'Abîme, leur donne l'espoir qu'il y a un moyen de sortir de cet enfer et les invite à rejoindre sa soi-disant résistance. Quelques discours larmoyants, de la nourriture, un abri, un vieux fusil laser... c'est tout ce qu'il a fallu pour nous convaincre qu'on pouvait s'évader de Commorragh. Qu'est-ce qu'on a pu être naïfs... »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Gerçekten Komiser midir bilmiyorum ama eşi benzeri görünmemiş bir yalancı ve sadist. Yöntemi çok basit: Yarık sokaklarını arşınlayanları buluyor, buradan kurtulacaklarına dair onlara umut verip "direnişine" katıyor. Coşku dolu birkaç konuşma, yemek, barınacak yer ve perişan bir silazer... Bu kadarı, bizim gibi safları Commorragh'tan kaçılabileceğine inandırmaya yetti."
languages.original_text: "I don't know if he's a real Commissar or not, but he's an exceptional liar and sadist. His method was simple: find people on the streets of the Chasm, give them hope that there was a way out of this place, then recruit them to his 'resistance.' A few stirring speeches, food, shelter, a beat-up lasgun — that's all it took for us gullible simpletons to believe we could escape Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "Onun gerçek bir Komiser olup olmadığını bilmiyorum ama eşi benzeri görünmemiş bir yalancı ve sadist. Yöntemi çok basit: Yarık sokaklarını arşınlayanları bul, buradan kurtulmanın bir yolu olduğuna dair onlara umut ver ve onları "direniş"ine al. Coşku dolu birkaç konuşma, yemek, barınacak yer ve perişan hâlde bir silazer... Bizim gibi saf ahmakları Commorragh'dan kaçılabileceğine inandırmak için bunlar yetmişti."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
